about_the_game:
Over Heroes is a 5v5 shooting push tower game in which the player and his teammates destroy layers of defense towers and destroy the opponent crystal to win the game.
The player can play the role of a shooter who can fly into the ground, as a single-sided warrior, and as a Druid who calls all kinds of magic.
Whether you like to lead, ambush, or aid allies, there is a hero for you.
The attack methods are also a variety of close combat, firearms, sorcery, we have everything, each hero has his own unique skills. Significantly improved game operability.
At the same time, we have excellent performance optimization technology, can be in the special effect performance is very bright, at the same time smooth running, low-end mobile phone can also play smoothly.


When I wrote the Dragon's Dog mother, I gave a brief overview of my current situation, and some people said that we were selling badly, and I didn't think that there would be so many people paying attention to this point, even more attention to the game. I blame me for this. To be honest, I also agree that playing games is just playing games, not doing anything else, and I will guarantee that I will not talk about it.
The reason for this new game is because it is really bad. The open world of Dragon's Dog mother games is too big. The quality of the game cannot be improved in a short period of time, but it can only be updated slowly. So I had no choice but to make a new game, and I'm sure to slowly update it later. For the sake of the elderly, the daughter-in-law, and the coming children, we must be pragmatic. Can't stop talking about this place....finally get a little piss, won't even mention it in the future.
I've always been a fan of games such as Dragon's Dog mother, and I'm not a person who wants to spend the passion of a gamer just running around. I want to keep doing it, but I can't just think about myself. I will definitely add a lot of content to the list later. We will pause here for a while to make a decision.
After talking about the old game for half a day, I think you don't have the confidence to play the new game, you don't have to worry about this, since I chose this new game, Explain that I think it has enough potential. There are more heroes behind, all kinds of magic, all kinds of equipment, moba game game game bureau growing happiness, The little taste didn't come.
In the first version, due to the workload, the moba part will have less weight, the shooting weight will be more, later slowly improve.
detailed_description:
Over Heroes is a 5v5 shooting push tower game in which the player and his teammates destroy layers of defense towers and destroy the opponent crystal to win the game.
The player can play the role of a shooter who can fly into the ground, as a single-sided warrior, and as a Druid who calls all kinds of magic.
Whether you like to lead, ambush, or aid allies, there is a hero for you.
The attack methods are also a variety of close combat, firearms, sorcery, we have everything, each hero has his own unique skills. Significantly improved game operability.
At the same time, we have excellent performance optimization technology, can be in the special effect performance is very bright, at the same time smooth running, low-end mobile phone can also play smoothly.


When I wrote the Dragon's Dog mother, I gave a brief overview of my current situation, and some people said that we were selling badly, and I didn't think that there would be so many people paying attention to this point, even more attention to the game. I blame me for this. To be honest, I also agree that playing games is just playing games, not doing anything else, and I will guarantee that I will not talk about it.
The reason for this new game is because it is really bad. The open world of Dragon's Dog mother games is too big. The quality of the game cannot be improved in a short period of time, but it can only be updated slowly. So I had no choice but to make a new game, and I'm sure to slowly update it later. For the sake of the elderly, the daughter-in-law, and the coming children, we must be pragmatic. Can't stop talking about this place....finally get a little piss, won't even mention it in the future.
I've always been a fan of games such as Dragon's Dog mother, and I'm not a person who wants to spend the passion of a gamer just running around. I want to keep doing it, but I can't just think about myself. I will definitely add a lot of content to the list later. We will pause here for a while to make a decision.

name: Over Heroes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: A third-person MOBA shooter game with heroes of various distinct skills, there's always one that suits you. In battle, you can choose weapons like guns, wands, bows, swords, and spears. Combine them with your teammates' magic to charge into the enemy and achieve ultimate victory.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Turkish*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
